## ProgressBuilderOptions.fullColor property

Color for the filled portion (default: '\#7571F9').

**Signature:**

```typescript
fullColor?: ColorInput;
```

## Remarks

Ignored if `gradient` is configured. Accepts hex colors or named colors.
